ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The book "Semiparametric Regression with R" by J. Harezlak, D. Ruppert & M.P. Wand (2018, Springer; ISBN: 978-1-4939-8851-8) makes use of datasets and scripts to explain semiparametric regression concepts. Each of the book's scripts are contained in this package as well as datasets that are not within other R packages. Functions that aid semiparametric regression analysis are also included.

The book "Semiparametric Regression with R" by J. Harezlak, D. Ruppert & M.P. Wand (2018, Springer; ISBN: 978-1-4939-8851-8) makes use of datasets and scripts to explain semiparametric regression concepts. Each of the book's scripts are contained in this package as well as datasets that are not within other R packages. Functions that aid semiparametric regression analysis are also included.

name: r-hrw
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0-5' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-hrw
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/HRW_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/HRW/HRW_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 132c992e29338e8e20d2ffe840a5b131f854f3b447d4c8b3736132464049d021

build:
  number: 3
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('HRW')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('HRW')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=HRW
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: 'The book "Semiparametric Regression with R" by J. Harezlak, D. Ruppert & M.P. Wand
    (2018, Springer; ISBN: 978-1-4939-8851-8) makes use of datasets and scripts to explain
    semiparametric regression concepts. Each of the book''s scripts are contained in
    this package as well as datasets that are not within other R packages. Functions
    that aid semiparametric regression analysis are also included.'
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
